scripts.alaarm:lint: cd packages/scenario-controller && npm run lint && cd ../scenario-client && npm npm run lint && cd ../scenario-admin && npm run lint && cd ../scenario-shared && npm run lint
scripts.alaarm:lint:fix: cd packages/scenario-controller && npm run lint:fix && cd ../scenario-client && npm run lint:fix && cd ../scenario-admin && npm run lint:fix && cd ../scenario-shared && npm run lint:fix
scripts.postinstall: cd packages/scenario-controller && npm install && cd ../scenario-client && npm install && cd ../scenario-admin && npm install && cd ../scenario-shared && npm install
